At Fri, 13 Jul 2007 18:58:34 +0000,
"Eric J. Bowman" <eric@...> wrote:
> Sending an ETag with a 410 response indicates that there is a 200 OK
> representation available, how?  The 410 Gone status is hardly
> overridden by the presence of an ETag.

I believe that Julian is saying, that, since ‘The ETag response-header
field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested
variant.’ and that a 410 indicates that there is no variant (that is,
representation), an ETag makes no sense.

best,
Erik Hetzner
